dt: {bc}impossible to transform into or restore to a desired or simpler condition
{bc}incapable of being factored into polynomials of lower degree with coefficients in some given field (such as the rational numbers) or integral domain (such as the integers)

shortdef: impossible to transform into or restore to a desired or simpler condition; specifically : incapable of being factored into polynomials of lower degree with coefficients in some given field (such as the rational numbers) or integral domain (such as the integers)
impossible to make less or smaller
